message: I propose a fair split. I take 90, you take 10. We can end this right now.
Alice, your offer was far from fair. Let's be reasonable. I'll take 70, you take 30, and we can be done with this.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40, and we can both get something.  Remember, the money is losing value with every round.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  You're losing money far faster than I am.  60/40 is my final offer.
